{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$2.4M in 2021-2022** on contracts with MARTEC.

Across 26 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 5 have at least one amendment (19%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 194% and the average number of amendments was 1.6. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$4.9M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.64 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$610.2K. The longest contract was 6.01 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$2.6M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
